comments: I took Chem 139 as an online class and really enjoyed her teaching style; everything is laid out very clearly, she allows you to pretty much go at your own pace, and her lectures are easy to follow. There\'s also a ton of opportunities for extra credit and you don\'t have to buy a textbook. It\'s an easy A if you put in the work.

comments: Linda Baker is sweet! She is aware that chemistry is a challenge and takes her responsabilities seriously. She lays out the instructions, agenda and grading criteria clearly in the beginning. There\'s a lot of information to cover, and a lot of homework. Linda moves at the pace needed giving plenty of extra credit, and assistance if you want it.

comments: Linda is one of my favorite professors! I was in her very first chem 139 class and was nervous because I had not taken it before and she had not teached it before. She is a great, hilarious, relatable person, but she really cares about her students. We go through every homework question, she provides practice exams, and tells you what is on quizzes

comments: Linda Baker is one of my all time favorite teachers. She was very helpful when I was confused and took time to answer questions in person or over email. The class is very organized and structured, and she returns papers in a timely manner.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Inspirational (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Hilarious (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I loved Ms. Baker! She was willing to take the time to explain any concepts or facts that you do not understand. Her quizzes and exams are very difficult. There is extra credit, and every point counts! The first part of the course is easy, but then it picks up extremely quick. No need to use the book. Use the online version with OWL for about $60.
